My learning path

"Change is the result of persistent self-study."

Learning Math
I have learned math since the beginning of my study life and keep writing about math under an intuitive way.
PhD Research
I researched on the growth of biofilm by using Finite Element Method, a numerical analysis method.
Web development
I've totally learned by myself, created website Math2IT and designed some Jekyll themes.
Data Scientist
I've started to learn to be a data scientist from the field of numerical analysis.
